Package model

Interface Layer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LayerImpl
    public interface Layer
    A layer that can contain an image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCompositeFilter​(java.lang.String filterOption, Layer other)
      Add a filter to the layer that needs the composite image.
      void addFilter​(java.lang.String filterOption)
      Add the given type of filter to this layer.
      void addImage​(Image img, int x, int y)
      add an image to this layer at the given coordinates.
      void concatLayer​(Layer other)
      combine two layers into one for the purposes of saving the project image.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImageOfLayer()
      get a bufferedImage representing the image on this layer.
      java.lang.String getFilterName()
      get the name of teh filter option this layer is using.
      Image getImage()
      get the image in this layer.
      java.lang.String getLayerDataPPM()
      get the text data of this layer in PPM style format.
      java.lang.String getLayerDataText()
      get the data of this layer in txt file format.

    • Method Detail

      • addImage

        void addImage​(Image img,
              int x,
              int y)
        add an image to this layer at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        img - the image to add
        x - the x coordinate to place the top left corner of the image at.
        y - the y coordinate to place the top left corner of the image at.

      • addFilter

        void addFilter​(java.lang.String filterOption)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add the given type of filter to this layer.
        Parameters:
        filterOption - the type of filter to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • concatLayer

        void concatLayer​(Layer other)
        combine two layers into one for the purposes of saving the project image.
        Parameters:
        other - the other layer to combine into this layer.

      • getLayerDataPPM

        java.lang.String getLayerDataPPM()
        get the text data of this layer in PPM style format.
        Returns:
        the text data

      • getImage

        Image getImage()
        get the image in this layer.
        Returns:
        the image of this layer

      • getLayerDataText

        java.lang.String getLayerDataText()
        get the data of this layer in txt file format.
        Returns:
        the data of this layer

      • getFilterName

        java.lang.String getFilterName()
        get the name of teh filter option this layer is using.
        Returns:
        the filteroption this layer is using

      • addCompositeFilter

        void addCompositeFilter​(java.lang.String filterOption,
                        Layer other)
        Add a filter to the layer that needs the composite image. Options: - difference, inversion blending filter - multiply, darkening blending filter - screen, brightening blending filter
        Parameters:
        filterOption - type of filter to add
        other - the layer with the composite image

      • getBufferedImageOfLayer

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImageOfLayer()
        get a bufferedImage representing the image on this layer.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage
